name: Air Warfare: Doughnut Delivery
description:
You're a pilot fighting in WW2, and your perilous mission is to deliver yummy donuts to other pilots who are very hungry. If you don't take the quickest route, you will run out of fuel, but beware : pilots of the Axis roam the skies...

How to play : Arrow keys or WASD to move. Each time you move 1 square, enemies move 1 square too. The wind currents push you 1 square where they are pointing.

Good luck !

Made for the 72 hour "Mini Jam 56 : Sky" with fellow dev TackyGuy 

Check out his page : https://tackyguy.itch.io/
